verses.content: “Hitaka khawm hin ka lungril chu ân thin a, A umna hmuna inthawk chun ân châwm a.
A râwl ri chu ngai ta u, A baua inthawka ri suok le chun,
Vân hnuoi po poa chun a tir suok a; A kâwlinlep chu hnuoi tâwpnahai chenin a tir suok bawk a.
Chu hnunga chun râwl chu ân rih a, A ropuina râwl chun a hung sukri tah a; A râwl chu hriet a ni pha chun anni chu ân châwltir nawh a.
Pathien chun a râwlin nasatakin a sukrih a; Thil ei hmu thei naw ropuitakhai chu a thaw a nih.
Vûr kuoma chun, ‘Hnuoiah tla rawh,’ a ta; Chuong ang bawkin ruo mal kuoma le A ruo nasa sûrhai kuoma chun a ti bawk a.
Mi tin kut chu a khârkhip a, Mi po pohai a siemhai chun an hriet theina dingin.
Chun, ramsahai chu pûkahai chun an feh a, An kuoahai chun an um zing a.
Simtieng pindana inthawk chun thlipui a hung a, Hmârtienga inthawkin phalbi a hung bawk a.
Pathien thuok chun vûr inkhal chu a pêk a Tui lientakhai khawm an inkhal zo a.
Anih, sûm sâtak chu tuihuin a sukrik a, A kâwlinlep sûm chu a thedar tah a.
Chun, a ṭhuoinain ân let vêl a, Thu a pêk taphawt an thaw theina dingin; Khawvêl hluo theia um chung po poa chun.
A hnuoi ta dingin amanih, sukdikna lem dingin amanih, Annawleh, zângaina leiin amani a hungtir hlak a.
“Aw Job, hi hi ngai ta, To veng vengin Pathien sinthaw maktakhai chu ngaituo ta.
An chunga chun Pathien chun ieng angin am maw ân phurtirin, A sûm kâwlinlep chu ân vartir hlak ti i hriet am?
Sûm rikziehai chu i hriet am, Hrietna famkima sip, sinthaw maktak el chu?
Sim thli leia hnuoi chu a um ṭawk ṭawk laiin, Iengtin am i silfênhai chu suklumin a um a, ti i hriet am?
Ama ang chun vân khi keiphar thei i ti, Dârthlalang sungta anga ngar khi?
Ama kuoma chun ieng am kan hril ding mîn chûktir la, Inthimna leiin kan thuhril chu kan sukrem thei si nawh a.
Thu ka hril ding a nih ti chu ama hril a ni ding am a nih? Annawleh, mi chun lem zoa um chu a nuom am a nih?
Tuhin mihai chun vânhaia var chu an hmu naw a nih; Amiruokchu, thli a hrâng a, anni chu a sukthiel hlak.
Hmârtienga inthawkin rângkachak ropuina chu a hung a; Pathien chu ropuina ṭiumtakin ân thuom a.
Iengkimthawthei chu ei hmu suok thei nawh, Thilthawtheina le indiknaah a ropui a, Felna a hau a, nêksâwr naw nih.
Chuleiin, mihai chun ama chu an ṭih a, Lungrila vara inngaihai khawm chu a pawisa chuong nawh,” tiin.
